casebody.data:
HIGH POINT BANK AND TRUST COMPANY
v.
HIGHMARK PROPERTIES, LLC, et al. No. 8PA14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Alan B. Powell, High Point, Attorney at Law, for High Point Bank and Trust Company. Ellis B. Drew, III, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for Highmark Properties, LLC, et al. Christopher Charles Finan, High Point, Attorney at Law, for High Point Bank and Trust Company. Matthew Allen Lawson Anderson, Attorney at Law, for High Point Bank and Trust Company. Ann G. Sugg, Attorney at Law, for Highmark Properties, LLC, et al. G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Frank Goldsmith, Marion, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Opinion The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of October 2014 by Defendants to Strike: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015." ERVIN, J. recused.
